attributes.action: Make family permits available to people having ILR similar to EU nationals
attributes.additional_details: Make Family Permit available to people with Indefinite leave to remain, especially parents can join their children
attributes.background: EU people have the option to apply for an EU Settlement Scheme family permit to join a family in the UK. But, this option is not available to ILR or British passport holders for non-EU countries. Law should be equal for everybody irrespective of person birth country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585059
